Syntux is a generative UI library for the web that automatically designs user interfaces to display given data. It works by converting data into a JSON-based React Interface Schema, allowing for dynamic and customizable UI generation.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Dangerzone is a security tool that converts potentially dangerous documents (PDFs, Office files, images) into safe PDFs by processing them within an isolated sandbox environment. It sanitizes the content by converting it to raw pixel data and then back to a PDF, ensuring that any malicious code is neutralized.

APKLeaks is a Python-based tool designed for static analysis of Android application package (APK) files. It scans APKs to identify URIs, network endpoints, and sensitive secrets embedded within the code, aiding in security assessments and bug bounty hunting.

Async Scanner is a high-performance TCP port scanner built with Rust and Tokio. It enables rapid scanning of network ports with customizable concurrency, timeouts, and optional banner grabbing, making it suitable for network diagnostics and security research.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Motionity is a free, open-source, web-based motion graphics editor that allows users to create animations with features like keyframing, masking, filters, and audio support. It aims to be a user-friendly alternative to complex software like After Effects, with integrations for easy asset searching and dragging.
